# Continuous Integration Workspace

This workspace contains a CI/CD pipeline project setup with GitHub Actions workflows, Docker support, and automated testing.

## Project Overview

A complete continuous integration and deployment system with:
- GitHub Actions workflows for automated testing and deployment
- Docker containerization support
- Linting and code quality checks
- Automated testing pipeline
- Environment configuration management

## Development Guidelines

- Follow the contribution guidelines in CONTRIBUTING.md
- Ensure all tests pass before creating pull requests
- Use conventional commit messages
- Keep workflows DRY and reusable

## Useful Commands

- `make test` - Run all tests
- `make lint` - Run linters
- `make build` - Build Docker image
- `make help` - Show all available commands
